dct_title_s: Hammond's international map of the world: on Mercator's projection
dct_description_sm: C. S. Hammond & Company. North Decimal Degree 80.000000. South Decimal Degree -70.0000. East Decimal Degree 105.0000. West Decimal Degree 90.0000. Alternate title: International map of the world on Mercator's projection. Ancillary maps of different views of the earth. Shows ship and air routes with mileage, and standard time zones. Map no.: 75103.
